name: Leisure suit Liana
description:
Leisure suit Liana is an adult visual novel. An hilarious spin off of Leisure yacht starring our Liana. Liana is forced by her mother, the well-known scientist and billionaire Allison Spencer, to work in a SpencerLab research center. Liana will be involved in a series of unfortunate and embarrassing events, from which she will not always come out in the best possible way.
At the end of the game there will be a score determined by the player's choices. Each choice that will be made will have a different weight. The higher the score, the more you have completed the game.
In the game there will be various animations, a gallery with the most important events and about 500 images.
